official_title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain oxygen-function amino compounds.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1992, the suspension of duty on certain oxygen-function amino compounds.

titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain oxygen-function amino compounds.
